attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to enter the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We know nothing about these people, which causes a great scare among our nation. It will also cause a massive strain on our public  services,housing,hospitals ect..
This mass influx of Syrian refugees being housed all across the UK in different councils will cause great  anger animosity among people already struggling to look for Housing. I know all too well as I have waited 10 years on the housing list and only been offered one property which I've taken & been very grateful for.
attributes.background: We allow all minorities but we won't allow a man who talks the truth. What happened to freedom of speech. It's racist to not let him in for that.  The people of this great nation needs a voice too, not just everyone who opposes Donald Trump to enter the UK.
